main event: Multiple UFO sightings documented in August 1956 across various locations in the United States.
interesting points: One witness in Worthington, Ohio described a darkish yellow object moving in a hopping manner,The report mentions a possible celestial phenomenon at the Ohio State Fair as a cause for the sighting,An observer in Tiburon, California initially mistook a flock of birds for a UFO and later estimated speeds of 550 to over 1000 mph for the objects,Multiple reports include military personnel witnessing unidentified aerial phenomena,Another sighting noted a prominent lawyer in Cincinnati describing a single white light moving silently in the night sky.
sighted object: Various unidentified flying objects described in multiple reports, including darkish yellow object, birds, and a white light
location: Various locations in the United States including Worthington, Ohio; Tiburon, California; and Cincinnati, Ohio
witness description: Civilians and military personnel reporting UFO sightings
